name: chatgpt.emailAddress
desc: [Optional] Your openai.com login email address. Provide this if you want to auto-fill your email address during autologin. You don't have to provide this if you want to fill it during login.

name: chatgpt.password
desc: [Optional] Your openai.com login password. Provide this if you want to auto-fill your password during autologin. You don't have to provide this if you want to fill it during login.

name: chatgpt.gpt3.generateCode-enabled
desc: Enable the code generation context menu item for the selected comment/code for Codex. Only available with code-* models

name: chatgpt.promptPrefix.addTests
desc: The prompt prefix used for adding tests for the selected code
default: Implement tests for the following code

name: chatgpt.promptPrefix.addTests-enabled
desc: Enable the prompt prefix used for adding tests for the selected code in the context menu

name: chatgpt.promptPrefix.findProblems
desc: The prompt prefix used for finding problems for the selected code
default: Find problems with the following code

name: chatgpt.promptPrefix.findProblems-enabled
desc: Enable the prompt prefix used for finding problems for the selected code in the context menu

name: chatgpt.promptPrefix.optimize
desc: The prompt prefix used for optimizing the selected code

name: chatgpt.promptPrefix.optimize-enabled
desc: Enable the prompt prefix used for optimizing the selected code in the context menu

name: chatgpt.promptPrefix.explain
desc: The prompt prefix used for explaining the selected code

name: chatgpt.promptPrefix.explain-enabled
desc: Enable the prompt prefix used for explaining the selected code in the context menu

name: chatgpt.promptPrefix.addComments
desc: The prompt prefix used for adding comments for the selected code
default: Add comments for the following code

name: chatgpt.promptPrefix.addComments-enabled
desc: Enable the prompt prefix used for adding comments for the selected code in the context menu

name: chatgpt.promptPrefix.completeCode
desc: The prompt prefix used for completing the selected code

name: chatgpt.promptPrefix.completeCode-enabled
desc: Enable the prompt prefix used for completing the selected code in the context menu

name: chatgpt.promptPrefix.customPrompt1
desc: Your custom prompt. It's disabled by default, please set to a custom prompt and enable it if you prefer using customized prompt

name: chatgpt.promptPrefix.customPrompt2
desc: Your custom prompt. It's disabled by default, please set to a custom prompt and enable it if you prefer using customized prompt

name: chatgpt.promptPrefix.adhoc-enabled
desc: Enable the prompt prefix used for adhoc command for the selected code in the context menu

name: chatgpt.response.showNotification
desc: Choose whether you'd like to receive a notification when ChatGPT bot responds to your query.

name: chatgpt.response.autoScroll
desc: Whenever there is a new question or response added to the conversation window, extension will automatically scroll to the bottom. You can change that behavior by disabling this setting.
